attributes.action: Leave the EU.Stop immigration & Foreign Aid for up to 10 years & pull our troups out of war zones ASAP.
attributes.additional_details:
We can no longer afford to police the world, We cannot keep giving foreign aid to countries that clearly don't deserve it. The human rights act is abused to the degree it is counter productive.
Once we have our country back & in control we can look again at reinstating some of these policies.
